Dr Rahman

Dr. Rahman is a highly experienced Neurologist with over 12 years of clinical expertise in diagnosing and treating complex conditions of the brain, spine, and nervous system.He is known for his patient-centered approach, accurate diagnosis, and commitment to using the latest advancements in neurological care.
Dr. Rahman specializes in managing chronic neurological diseases, movement disorders, headaches, epilepsy, stroke care, neuropathy, and neurodevelopmental conditions.His calm demeanor and clear explanations help patients and families feel confident and well-supported throughout their treatment journey.
